availability.p: Copyright Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

msIdentifier.institution: Royal Asiatic Society of Great Britain and Ireland

altIdentifier.idno: Morley Handwritten Catalogue Np 166 (bis). This number only appears in a pencilled addition, probably not by Morley.

msItem.title: Shahnamah.
msItem.note: The last 7 folios are replacements. F1a, Stamp, the name in ink: Presented to the ROYAL ASIATIC SOCIETY by John Romer Esq F1b: a) Impression of large circular seal of Jan Rumir Bahadur dated 1827. b) Impression of small octagonal seal of Jan Rumir Bahadur. Ruled margins. Headings in red. 1 miniature, Indian, late 17th century on f. 404 verso. With the older preface, of de Blois' type i. (Storey, v, p, 111)

listBibl.bibl: For the provenance see Donations Register for November 18 1848. Also J.R.A.S. for 1837, iv, p. xiv.

layoutDesc.p: 25 lines to the page in four columns

bindingDesc.p: Brown leather Oriental binding with blind-stamped decoration, the spine replaced in England, with the title etc tooled.

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org
